content: I would like to add FreeBSD CI to https://github.com/rust-lang/socket2. Cirrus-CI provides FreeBSD machines and we've been using it for a couple of years for Mio (https://cirrus-ci.com/github/tokio-rs/mio). However there is some setup required to allow organisational access to the repo. Is there anyone here who could do that? A quick start guide is available here: https://cirrus-ci.org/guide/quick-start.
You probably want to ask at #t-infra.

Hans Kratz said:

You probably want to ask at #t-infra.

Done: https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/242791-t-infra/topic/Supporting.20Cirrus-CI.20in.20rust-lang.20repos/near/263003451. Thanks
